short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to autocomplete the login page for unipd sso

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to autcomplete the email type field of the login page.
Simply choose if you have a @unipd.it or @studenti.unipd.it account and everytime you access the login page it will be automatically chosen for you.
The extension is also open source and available at the github page 
https://github.com/MarcoNardi/unipd-SSO-extension
